author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE  WESTERN GULF COAST... ...CENTER OF BERYL EXPECTED TO EMERGE OVER THE GULF OF MEXICO  DURING THE NEXT FEW HOURS...
summary:
...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE  WESTERN GULF COAST... ...CENTER OF BERYL EXPECTED TO EMERGE OVER THE GULF OF MEXICO  DURING THE NEXT FEW HOURS...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Fri Jul 5
 the center of Beryl was located near 21.2, -89.2
 with movement WNW at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 989 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
